T02TD1447E:292b-1: shr'i tsakra samba ra ho ma bi dhi:/
T02TD1447E:293a-1: 'khor lo'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga / bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1447E:293a-2: sngo ser dmar po ma rka ta ljang gu'i sku 'chang spyan gsum can //
T02TD1447E:293a-3: dbang chen la sogs phyogs bzhi'i zhal mnga' shes rab dmar spyan gsum /
T02TD1447E:293a-4: phyag gnyis bgegs kyi lpags 'dzin rdo rje dril bu gnyis na 'chang //
T02TD1447E:293a-5: phyag gzhan phyag mtshan brgyad po 'dzin pa bde ba mchog gis srungs //
T02TD1447E:293a-6: thog mar bde mchog 'khor lo yi //
T02TD1447E:293a-7: rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud las ni //
T02TD1447E:293a-8: sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir //
T02TD1447E:293a-9: sbyin sreg rim pa bdag gis bshad //
T02TD1447E:293a-10: dkyil 'khor dag ni sgrub dus su //
T02TD1447E:293a-11: sbyin sreg gis ni tshim par byas //
T02TD1447E:293a-12: gsang sngags ma bzlas mi 'grub la //
T02TD1447E:293a-14: las rnams thams cad rab bsgrub phyir //
T02TD1447E:293a-15: sbyin sreg las rnams brtsam par bya //
T02TD1447E:293a-16: sbyin sreg las rnams med pa las //
T02TD1447E:293a-18: de bas 'dir ni sngags pa yis //
T02TD1447E:293a-19: brtson pas sbyin sreg las rnams bya //
T02TD1447E:293a-20: bla med nang dang phyi yi ste //
T02TD1447E:293a-21: sbyin sreg dag ni gsum du 'dod //
T02TD1447E:293a-22: gzhan dag zhi ba la sogs la //
T02TD1447E:293a-23: sbyin sreg dag ni bzhi ru 'dod //
T02TD1447E:293a-24: de la bla na med pa dang por brjod bar bya ste ;
T02TD1447E:293a-25: / rnam rtog med pa'i sems nyid ni //
T02TD1447E:293a-26: thab khung sgra yi mtshan ma dag / rnam dben me yi dbus su ni //
T02TD1447E:293a-27: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po lnga //
T02TD1447E:293a-28: sems las byung ba ma lus pa'i //
T02TD1447E:293a-29: yam shing dag gi sreg blugs bya //
T02TD1447E:293a-30: gzugs la sogs pa'i 'byung ba rnams //
T02TD1447E:293a-31: yam shing du ni rab grags yin //
T02TD1447E:293a-32: padma thab khung yin par bshad //
T02TD1447E:293a-33: rdo rje blugs gzar yin par grags //
T02TD1447E:293a-34: rtag tu sa bon sreg blugs kyis //
T02TD1447E:293a-35: bla med gnas ni thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1447E:293a-36: bla med rjes su sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1447E:293a-37: phung po la sogs bud shing bsregs //
T02TD1447E:293a-38: ye shes me ni skyes gyur pas //
T02TD1447E:293a-39: phyi rol bsreg pa bdag med yin //
T02TD1447E:293a-40: dzny'a na b'a da bas bshad pa //
T02TD1447E:293a-41: sbyin sreg cho ga phyi rim pa //
T02TD1447E:293a-42: sems dang sems byung dag yin te //
T02TD1447E:293a-43: phung po la sogs bud shing bsregs //
T02TD1447E:293a-45: sems kyis ji tsam bsams pa dag /
T02TD1447E:293b-0: @293b phyi rol sbyin sreg yin par 'dod //
T02TD1447E:293b-1: ye shes me la phung po yi //
T02TD1447E:293b-2: yam shing sreg pa bla med yin //
T02TD1447E:293b-3: de nas yang nang gi brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1447E:293b-4: nyon mongs sel ba zhi byed yin //
T02TD1447E:293b-5: ting nge 'dzin ni rgyas byed phyir //
T02TD1447E:293b-6: rang gi lha yi sbyor bas bdag / ji lta bar ni sems kyis bya //
T02TD1447E:293b-7: skye ba'i las las rnam grol zhing //
T02TD1447E:293b-8: tshe ni yang dag 'phel ba'i phyir //
T02TD1447E:293b-9: ci 'dod sreg blugs las bya ba //
T02TD1447E:293b-10: nang gi sbyin sreg dag tu bshad //
T02TD1447E:293b-11: ji ltar dus bzhi'i rim pa yis //
T02TD1447E:293b-12: sbyin sreg bzhi yang rab tu bshad //
T02TD1447E:293b-13: zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang //
T02TD1447E:293b-14: dbang dang mngon spyod shes par bya //
T02TD1447E:293b-15: sdig pa 'jig phyir zhi ba ste ;
T02TD1447E:293b-16: / bsod nams yongs 'dzin rgyas pa yin //
T02TD1447E:293b-17: chags pa bsgom phyir dbang 'gyur te //
T02TD1447E:293b-18: rtog bzad phyir gsod pa yin //
T02TD1447E:293b-19: de nas yang phyi'i bshad pa bya ste /
T02TD1447E:293b-20: rgyud so so las slob dpon tha dad pas sbyin sreg gi cho ga ji skad bshad par bya /
T02TD1447E:293b-21: 'di ni rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud las bstan te ;
T02TD1447E:293b-22: bdag gis 'khor lo sdom pa'i man ngag cung zad tsam brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1447E:293b-24: sems can dbye bas mtha' yas te //
T02TD1447E:293b-25: rigs kyi dbye bas lnga ru 'gyur //
T02TD1447E:293b-26: las kyi dbye bas bzhi ru 'gyur //
T02TD1447E:293b-27: thab khung rnams ni de ltar bshad //
T02TD1447E:293b-28: zhi ba la ni zlum la dkar //
T02TD1447E:293b-29: rgyas la ser po dbang chen te //
T02TD1447E:293b-30: dbang la dmar po gru gsum pa //
T02TD1447E:293b-31: mngon spyod zla ba phyed pa yin //
T02TD1447E:293b-32: khru gang tshad nas brtsams nas ni //
T02TD1447E:293b-33: khru ni bcu drug pa yi bar //
T02TD1447E:293b-34: de yi tshad du brkos nas ni //
T02TD1447E:293b-35: rang gi tshad du bya ba yin //
T02TD1447E:293b-36: khru gang tshad kyi thab khung la //
T02TD1447E:293b-37: sor bzhi dor bar kha khyer sor bzhis bstod //
T02TD1447E:293b-38: khru phyed brkos la de bzhin du //
T02TD1447E:293b-39: thams cad la yang blta bya ste //
T02TD1447E:293b-40: kun kyang rang gi kha khyer du bya'o //
T02TD1447E:293b-41: thab khung gi dbus su rdo rje dang zangs gri bri'o //
T02TD1447E:293b-42: thab khung gi nang du phyogs bzhir kha tv'am ga dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag mtshan rnams bri'o //
T02TD1447E:293b-43: kha khyer la padma'i steng du zangs gri'i phreng ba ;
T02TD1447E:293b-44: thab kyi phyi rol du gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi par dkyil 'khor gyi thig btab ste /
T02TD1447E:293b-45: 'khor lo gsum byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD1447E:293b-47: dur khrod brgyad dang bcas pa /
T02TD1447E:293b-48: ji ltar 'khor lo gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag mtshan bzhin du 'dir yang de ltar blta'o //
T02TD1447E:294a-1: la sogs par lcags kyu la sogs mtshan par bya'o //
T02TD1447E:294a-3: padma nags kyi lcug ma dang //
T02TD1447E:294a-4: phreng ba dang ni spyi blugs dang //
T02TD1447E:294a-5: ri dags pags pa mdung rtse gsum //
T02TD1447E:294a-6: zla ba phyed pa rgyal mtshan dang //
T02TD1447E:294a-7: ral ba'i tshogs dang mig dang ni //
T02TD1447E:294a-8: 'khor lo dung dang dbyug pa dang //
T02TD1447E:294a-9: ral gri phub dang mdung dang ni //
T02TD1447E:294a-10: dril bu ba dan rma bya dang //
T02TD1447E:294a-11: ra skyes lnga lnga byas nas ni //
T02TD1447E:294a-12: shar phyogs snam bu dag la bri //
T02TD1447E:294a-13: de ltar thab thams cad byas nas //
T02TD1447E:294a-14: las dang rjes su mthun pa'i kha khyer bya'o //
T02TD1447E:294a-15: zhi ba la ni rdo rjes mtshan pa'am /
T02TD1447E:294a-17: rgyas pa la ni rin po ches mtshan pa /
T02TD1447E:294a-18: dbang la ni padmas mtshan pa /
T02TD1447E:294a-19: drag po la ni rtse gsum pas mtshan pa ste /
T02TD1447E:294a-20: 'di ltar las dang rjes su mthun par rang rang gi mtshan mas mtshan pa'i kha khyer bya'o //
T02TD1447E:294a-21: shar du zhi ba bya bar bshad //
T02TD1447E:294a-22: lho phyogs su ni rgyas pa ste //
T02TD1447E:294a-23: dbang gi las ni nub tu bshad //
T02TD1447E:294a-24: gsad pa byang du bya ba yin //
T02TD1447E:294a-25: ji ltar las dang rjes mthun par //
T02TD1447E:294a-26: rdul tshon gyis ni rdzogs par bri //
T02TD1447E:294a-27: yang na me tog dag kyang rung //
T02TD1447E:294a-28: thab khung dag ni de ltar bya //
T02TD1447E:294a-29: yam shing bud shing rdzas la sogs //
T02TD1447E:294a-30: mtshan nyid me yi rtags rnams ni //
T02TD1447E:294a-31: gzhan du rgya cher bshad pas na ;
T02TD1447E:294a-32: /'dir ni bdag gis ma bsgrags so //
T02TD1447E:294a-33: man ngag gcig pu'i rim pa dag / rnal 'byor rgyud las grags pa rnams //
T02TD1447E:294a-34: mdor bsdus nas ni nges par yang //
T02TD1447E:294a-35: ji tsam nus pa bshad par bya //
T02TD1447E:294a-36: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus khrus byas te //
T02TD1447E:294a-40: thal ba bsres pas lus byugs te /
T02TD1447E:294a-41: ji skad bshad pa'i rgyan bgo bar bya ste /
T02TD1447E:294a-42: stag gi pags pa bgos shing //
T02TD1447E:294a-44: na ra'i rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan pas sems can gyi don rtag tu bya'o //
T02TD1447E:294a-45: phyi rol bzlog tshul 'chang ba ni //
T02TD1447E:294a-46: de ni zhi sogs las rnams la //
T02TD1447E:294a-47: thugs ni zhi bar shes par bya //
T02TD1447E:294a-48: nyi mas gdungs pa'i rgya mtsho cha //
T02TD1447E:294a-49: gangs ltar nang grang phyi rol tsha //
T02TD1447E:294a-50: thugs rje chen po'i khro bo yis //
T02TD1447E:294b-0: de ltar bu'i las dang rjes su mthun par gos kyi bye brag bgo bar @294b bya'o //
T02TD1447E:294b-1: de ni sgrub pa po'i las so //
T02TD1447E:294b-2: de nas rang gi lha'i nga rgyal bskyed de /
T02TD1447E:294b-3: ji ltar bshad pa'i las dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs su byas la /
T02TD1447E:294b-4: zhal bzhi pa dang sku gsung thugs kyi phur bu'i sngags dang /
T02TD1447E:294b-5: de bzhin du gsal byed ni ra ksha raksha dang /
T02TD1447E:294b-6: h'um gsum dang phat ni brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1447E:294b-7: gsang sngags de las khro bo la sogs pa spros te /
T02TD1447E:294b-8: bgegs kyi tshogs thams cad bsreg par byas nas /
T02TD1447E:294b-9: thal ba dang bgegs rnams bsregs te /
T02TD1447E:294b-10: phyogs bcur byer bar bsam mo //
T02TD1447E:294b-11: de bzhin du g-yas brkyang ba la sogs pa'i stang stabs kyang bya'o //
T02TD1447E:294b-12: 'di ltar bgegs kyi tshogs rnams phur bu dang /
T02TD1447E:294b-14: ra ba la sogs pas thab khung gi thon khor bgegs med par bya ste /
T02TD1447E:294b-15: thab khung byin gyis brlabs par shes par bya'o //
T02TD1447E:294b-16: yi ge h'um ngam rang gi lha'i tshogs kyi yi ge gang yang rung pa las dang rjes su mthun pa las thab khung bskyed la /
T02TD1447E:294b-17: de'i dbus lte ba la yi ge re pha 'bar ba yongs su gyur pa las gru gsum par byas shing bsgoms la /
T02TD1447E:294b-18: de'i grva gsum la aom a'a: h'um yi ge gsum gyis 'dod pa dang /
T02TD1447E:294b-20: gzugs med pa'i khams gsum sa 'og dang sa bla mtho ris kyi gzugs padma dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje gsum bskyed de /
T02TD1447E:294b-21: dbus su re pha 'bar ba yongs su gyur pa mthong ba dang /
T02TD1447E:294b-22: mtshan ma'i yi ge gsum dang /
T02TD1447E:294b-23: re pha yongs su gyur pa las 'bar ba'i dbus su chu'i dkyil 'khor gnas pa la khams gsum gyi bdag po dpal khrag 'thung bar spros te /
T02TD1447E:294b-24: zhi ba'i don du p'a pa ka'i me bsgoms la zhi ba'i gzugs can dkar po zhal gcig pa /
T02TD1447E:294b-27: ral ba'i cod pan can phyag g-yas pa gnyis na dbyug tho dang /
T02TD1447E:294b-29: g-yon pa na bgrang phreng dang /
T02TD1447E:294b-31: rgyan dang gos dkar po bsnams pa //
T02TD1447E:294b-33: lus thams cad la bdud rtsi dkar po'i rgyun 'bab pa /
T02TD1447E:294b-34: ral pa la mkha' 'gro ma gnas par bsgom mo //
T02TD1447E:294b-35: de bzhin du rgyas pa la ni khyad par du mdog ser po /
T02TD1447E:294b-37: dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa /
T02TD1447E:295a-1: kyi mes sems can thams cad la mchog stsol ba /
T02TD1447E:295a-2: stobs dang mdog dang dpal rdzogs par mdzad pa cod pan du bsgom mo //
T02TD1447E:295a-3: rim pa gzhan yang dbang dang dgug pa la 'dod pa'i med mar po me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa /
T02TD1447E:295a-5: khanda ro ha cod pan la gnas pa /
T02TD1447E:295a-6: khyad par du g-yas g-yon na lcags kyu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa /
T02TD1447E:295a-7: gzhan ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD1447E:295a-8: gsad pa la rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa mdog nag po 'jigs pa spyan zlum po h'um gi sa bon las skyes pa gos dang rgyan nag po mi rus kyi phreng bas brgyan pa /
T02TD1447E:295a-9: zla phyed lta bur 'bar ba'i dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa /
T02TD1447E:295a-10: gzugs can ma'i cod pan can //
T02TD1447E:295a-12: 'jigs byed chen po nag po 'bar ba las bya rgod dang khra la sogs pas /
T02TD1447E:295a-13: nam mkha' khyab par bkug ste /
T02TD1447E:295a-14: gang dang gang byas pa de zos par bsgom mo ;
T02TD1447E:295a-15: / rlung gi mes ni gsad pa la sogs pa'i las bya'o //
T02TD1447E:295a-17: de la zhi ba la ni 'o ma can gyi shing las byung ba'i me'am /
T02TD1447E:295a-19: bram ze tha ma'i mes bya'o //
T02TD1447E:295a-20: rgyas pa la ni rgyal po dang /
T02TD1447E:295a-23: rgyal rigs kyi khyim nas byung ba'i mes bya'o //
T02TD1447E:295a-24: dbang la ni smad 'tshong ma dang /
T02TD1447E:295a-25: rje'u rigs kyi khyim nas byung ba'i mes bya'o //
T02TD1447E:295a-26: dgug pa la ni gar mkhan dang /
T02TD1447E:295a-28: lam du bus pa'i mes bya'o //
T02TD1447E:295a-29: gsod pa la ni rdo las byung ba'i me'am /
T02TD1447E:295a-30: gdol ba'i khyim nas byung ba'i mes bya'o //
T02TD1447E:295a-31: thams cad kyang dur khrod kyi me dang /
T02TD1447E:295a-32: dur khrod kyi sol bar ldan par bya'o //
T02TD1447E:295a-34: de nas mchod yon snod gnyis ni //
T02TD1447E:295a-35: ma chag sdug cing mdzes pa la /
T02TD1447E:295a-36: chang ngam yang na sbyar ba'i chang //
T02TD1447E:295a-37: me tog ldan pas dgang bar bya //
T02TD1447E:295a-38: de la bdud rtsi lnga po yis //
T02TD1447E:295a-39: gnyis ka yang ni blug par bya //
T02TD1447E:295a-40: ye ge bdun pa gcig bu dang //
T02TD1447E:295a-41: gnyis pa gnod mdzes rgyal po dag / gcig ni brgya rtsa brgyad pa ste //
T02TD1447E:295a-42: gnyis pa dag ni bzhi cha yin //
T02TD1447E:295a-43: gnas la legs par bzhag nas su //
T02TD1447E:295a-44: gos kyis bkab ste mchod par bya //
T02TD1447E:295a-45: mchod yon gyi snod kyi cho ga'o //
T02TD1447E:295b-0: sbyin @295b sreg yo byad thams cad kun //
T02TD1447E:295b-1: bdag gi g-yas su dgod par bya //
T02TD1447E:295b-2: rdo rje de bzhin dril bu dang //
T02TD1447E:295b-3: mchod yon snod ni g-yon du gzhag / dgang gzar dang ni blugs gzar dang //
T02TD1447E:295b-4: mar ni mdun du gzhag par bya //
T02TD1447E:295b-5: thams cad kyang ni bsangs nas gzhag /'di ni rdzas gzhag pa'o //
T02TD1447E:295b-6: de nas phyi rol gyi me blangs la /
T02TD1447E:295b-7: gnod mdzes kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags kyis ku sha blangs te //
T02TD1447E:295b-8: de'i chus lan gsum bsangs la /
T02TD1447E:295b-9: rtsva skam po gtsang ma dang bcas pas dag par byas te /
T02TD1447E:295b-10: bdud rtsi lngas bsres te thab khung du bzhag ste /
T02TD1447E:295b-11: aom shr'i he ru ka ma h'a badzra dzva la h'um h'um /
T02TD1447E:295b-12: gsang sngags 'di dang bcas par rlung g-yab kyis g-yab ste thab tu me sbar ro //
T02TD1447E:295b-13: de'i dbus su dam tshig sems dpa'i me sngar bshad pa'i rnam par bsams te /
T02TD1447E:295b-14: ye shes sems dpa'i me sngags dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya 'dis spyan drangs te /
T02TD1447E:295b-15: lag pa g-yas pa mi 'jigs par byas la /
T02TD1447E:295b-16: mthe bong srin lag gi tshigs la bkug pa'i thabs kyis spyan drang ngo //
T02TD1447E:295b-17: ae hye hi ma h'a bh'u ta de ba ri shi dvi dza satva ma gri hi tva yu dham ma h'a rasmi aa sminsanni hi to bha ba /
T02TD1447E:295b-18: aom he ru ka ma h'a badzra p'a ba ka / aagna ye ma ma sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1447E:295b-20: aom he ru ka ma h'a badzra ma hendra /
T02TD1447E:295b-21: aagna ye ma ma pushtim ku ru boo sha taa rgyas pa'i'o //
T02TD1447E:295b-22: aom he ru ka ma h'a badzra k'a ma aagna ye ma ma a'a mu kam ba shim ku ru ho //
T02TD1447E:295b-24: aom he ru ka ma h'a badzra kro dha aagna ye dza hi kro dha ya h'um aa mu kam m'a ra ya h'um phat /
T02TD1447E:295b-26: me lha 'ongs pa dang mther 'thung dang nye reg byas te bkug la dam tshig gi me lha la gzhug go //
T02TD1447E:295b-27: de nas mchod yon gyi snong blangs la bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres te thugs ka nas zhabs bsil dbul lo //
T02TD1447E:295b-28: aom shr'i he ru ka ma h'a badzra pra w'a ra satk'a ram pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
T02TD1447E:295b-29: de nas lag pa gnyis kyis lan gsum aargha 'di dbul te /
T02TD1447E:295b-30: aom ma h'a ma ma ya tad ma grihna siddhimme pra yatstsha sv'a h'a /
T02TD1447E:295b-32: de nas 'khor lo gsum byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02TD1447E:295b-33: aom a'a: h'um mgo bo dang mgrin pa dang snying ga rnams su'o //
T02TD1447E:295b-34: de nas yan lag drug tu dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1447E:296a-0: de nas rdo rje sems ma la sogs pas yid kyis dbang @296a * //
T02TD1447E:296a-2: l'a sya la sogs pa brgyud kyis yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD1447E:296a-3: dar dpyangs dang phreng ba la sogs pa bcings te go bskon no //
T02TD1447E:296a-4: de nas me long dang sman la sogs pa khrus kyi yo byad dang /
T02TD1447E:296a-5: dril bu dkrol zhing spos dang rdzas snga ma dang bcas pa la yi ge brgya pa bzlas te khrus bya'o //
T02TD1447E:296a-6: yi ge brgya pa 'di dag ste /
T02TD1447E:296a-7: aom he ru ka badzra sa ma ya ma nu p'a la ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1447E:296a-8: de nas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi'i gsang sngags dang /
T02TD1447E:296a-9: yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi gsang sngags kyis btab pa'i bum pa lngas dbang bskur ro //
T02TD1447E:296a-10: zhi ba la ni mkha' 'gro ma'i gzugs can rnam par snang mdzad dbu rgyan du bsam mo //
T02TD1447E:296a-11: rgyas pa la ni l'a ma'i tshul can rin chen 'byung ldan dbu rgyan du bsam mo //
T02TD1447E:296a-12: dbang la ni dum skyes ma'i tshul can snang ba mtha' yas dbu rgyan du bsam mo //
T02TD1447E:296a-13: gsang pa la ni gzugs can ma'i tshul can don yod grub pa dbu rgyan du bsam mo //
T02TD1447E:296a-14: me lha'i zhal dang dgang gzar gyi kha la rang gi bdag po'i sa bon gyi yi ge dgod do //
T02TD1447E:296a-15: de nas aom d'a ki n'i dzi ni dzi ka sv'a h'a /
T02TD1447E:296a-16: 'dis mar la mngon bar bsngags te /
T02TD1447E:296a-17: de bzhin du rgyas pa la yang l'a ma dang rin chen 'byung ldan la sogs pa'i sngags kyis gdab bo //
T02TD1447E:296a-18: de ltar me 'bar bar shes nas thog mar blugs gzar gyis dgang blugs gsum /
T02TD1447E:296a-19: aom shr'i he ru ka dzva la dzva la h'um sngags 'di dang bcas par dbul lo //
T02TD1447E:296a-20: de nas me 'bar ba dang mdog dang sgra la sogs pa las bgegs med par shes nas /
T02TD1447E:296a-21: bgegs thams cad bcing bar bya ba'i phyir phyogs bzhi nas ku sha dgram mo //
T02TD1447E:296a-22: aom ai me ku sha shu bha dib bya su ra brahma pa bi ta /
T02TD1447E:296a-23: tri na ratna tra ya ra ta hi dhi pri thi bi dza garbha /
T02TD1447E:296a-24: aa bighnam ma ma sh'antim ku ru bantu sv'a h'a /
T02TD1447E:296a-25: 'di lta bu'i rim pas rtsa ba dang bcas par phyung ste /
T02TD1447E:296a-26: mdog ljang gu'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sbyor ro //
T02TD1447E:296a-27: gzhan rnams la ni mnyam par gcad par bya'o //
T02TD1447E:296a-28: me'i rim pa ni shar ni shar gyi mdun nas te /
T02TD1447E:296a-29: lho ni lho'i mdun nas so //
T02TD1447E:296a-30: nub ni nub kyi mdun nas so //
T02TD1447E:296a-31: byang ni byang gi mdun nas so //
T02TD1447E:296b-0: me thab kyi sa phyogs kun du @296b zhal bzhi pa'i sngags kyis mchod yon gyi snod la bsngags te bsang ngo //
T02TD1447E:296b-1: de nas zhal bzhi pa'i sngags sam //
T02TD1447E:296b-2: khanda ro ha'i gsang sngags gang yang rung bas mda' dang tshon skud la btab ste /
T02TD1447E:296b-3: mda' bzhi phyogs mtshams su btsugs la sna lnga'i skud pas yongs su bskor na rdo rje'i bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1447E:296b-4: ku sha la sogs pa dgram pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1447E:296b-5: de nas me'i las dang rjes su mthun par dngul gyi snod dam /
T02TD1447E:296b-6: padma'i snod gang yang rung ba mdun du bsams te /
T02TD1447E:296b-7: yang mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dang /
T02TD1447E:296b-8: 'thor 'thung byin la dgad blugs dbul lo //
T02TD1447E:296b-9: de la rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1447E:296b-10: pus mo gnyis kyi nang du lag pa bzhag ste /
T02TD1447E:296b-11: lag pa g-yas pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis dgang gzar blangs la /
T02TD1447E:296b-12: mthe bong dang mthe'u chung brtan par bzung ste /
T02TD1447E:296b-13: sor mo lhag ma rnams yu ba'i steng du bzhag la mar gyis yangs su bkang ba'i dgang blugs bdun nam gsum mam gcig me lha'i sngags kyis me lha'i zhal du dbul lo //
T02TD1447E:296b-14: aom he ru ka aagna ye aa mu ka sya sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1447E:296b-15: de bzhin du thams cad la yang sbyar ro //
T02TD1447E:296b-16: de nas bsreg pa'i rim pa blta bar bya ste /
T02TD1447E:296b-18: de nas yam shing ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du'o //
T02TD1447E:296b-20: de nas til dang 'bras chan dang /
T02TD1447E:296b-22: de nas ku sha dang d'ur ba'i myu gu ni spyi gtsug la'o //
T02TD1447E:296b-23: de nas nas dang gro dang 'bras dang mon sran gre'u rnams ni zhal la'o //
T02TD1447E:296b-24: de bzhin du zhi ba'i rdzas la sogs pa rnams kyang de bzhin no //
T02TD1447E:296b-29: mchod yon dang 'thor 'thung ni phyag la'o //
T02TD1447E:296b-30: mar me ni mdun du ste /
T02TD1447E:296b-32: de nas sdig pa bsreg pa'i phyir dang por til gyi sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02TD1447E:296b-33: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1447E:296b-34: de nas rdzas thams cad gsang sngags gcig gis bya'o //
T02TD1447E:296b-35: aom badzra aa na la ma h'a bh'u ta dzva la ya sarbba bhismam ku ru sarbba bighn'am h'um phat /
T02TD1447E:296b-36: aa mo ka sya sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1447E:296b-37: yang na aom he ru k'a ya bid ma he bidy'a r'a dz'a ya dhi ma he tan no b'i ra pa ra dzo ta ya ya h'um /
T02TD1447E:297a-0: aa mo ka sya sh'antim ku ru sv'a @297a * //
T02TD1447E:297a-2: yang na rgyud gzhan las bshad pa so so'i spyi'i gsang sngags kyang rung ngo //
T02TD1447E:297a-3: aom badzra aadzny'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1447E:297a-5: aom aa gna ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1447E:297a-7: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1447E:297a-9: p'a pam da ha na sv'a h'a /
T02TD1447E:297a-10: til dang yungs kar rnams kyi'o //
T02TD1447E:297a-11: aom sarbba sam pa de sv'a h'a /
T02TD1447E:297a-13: aom aa pra ti ha ta badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1447E:297a-15: aom badzra a'a yu: she sv'a h'a /
T02TD1447E:297a-17: aom ma h'a be g'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1447E:297a-19: aom badzra ghasma re sv'a h'a /
T02TD1447E:297a-21: aom badzra bi dza y'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1447E:297a-23: aom ma h'a ba l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1447E:297a-25: aom badzra pushta ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1447E:297a-27: aom ma h'a shr'i bha ya bha ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1447E:297a-30: dz'a ti pha la rnams kyi'o //
T02TD1447E:297a-31: zhu ba'i rdzas lhag ma rnams kyi ni me'i rang gi gsang sngags rnams kyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD1447E:297a-32: au dumw'a ra'i shing gi yal ga la sogs pa lhag ma rnams la ni /
T02TD1447E:297a-33: aom la sogs pa nas rang gi ming dang mthar sv'a h'a bcas pa'i rim pas sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD1447E:297a-34: rdzas thams cad la bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres te /
T02TD1447E:297a-37: bsang gtor la sogs pa bya ste /
T02TD1447E:297a-38: ye shes kyi me lha spyan drangs la /
T02TD1447E:297a-39: snying ga nas yi ge h'um gi 'od zer gyis bskul nas nam mkha' las bkug ste /
T02TD1447E:297a-40: las ma lus pa'i gzhi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi me lha ji skad bshad pa'i las kyi rgyan dang /
T02TD1447E:297a-42: ji skad bshad pa'i mdog dang /
T02TD1447E:297a-43: phyag ji ltar gnas pa'i dpal khrag 'thung gi gzugs byon pa dang /
T02TD1447E:297a-44: de'i thugs kar ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams dang /
T02TD1447E:297a-45: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang ngo //
T02TD1447E:297a-47: aom shr'i badzra he ru ka ae hye hi bha ga b'an /
T02TD1447E:297a-48: ai ha b'akya sa ma ye ma tsa panydza ai mri ta aargham sam pra t'itstsha sva bu tsam bi tra si ta me /
T02TD1447E:297a-49: 'dis thab khung g-yas kyi drung du bltas te /
T02TD1447E:297a-50: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat d'a ki n'i dz'a la sam ba ra sv'a h'a /
T02TD1447E:297a-51: zhabs bsil dang mchod yon dang /
T02TD1447E:297a-54: l'a sye la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD1447E:297b-0: rtsa @297b ba'i sngags brgyad kyis bstod do //
T02TD1447E:297b-1: rdo rje bcings la lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang /
T02TD1447E:297b-3: dril bu rnams kyis dgug pa dang /
T02TD1447E:297b-4: gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang /
T02TD1447E:297b-6: dri shya dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya ho 'dis me lha'i dam tshig sems dpa'i zhal du thams cad kyi bdag nyid rab tu gzhug go //
T02TD1447E:297b-7: de ltar snga ma bzhin du me long gi thog tu khrus byas la dbang lnga gsol te /
T02TD1447E:297b-10: ye shes sems dpa' rang gi thugs kar mtshan ma'i dbus su rang gi zla tshes kyi yi ge la dkyil 'khor ma lus pa drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi lha'i rang bzhin mthong ba la yang mchod yon phul te /
T02TD1447E:297b-11: snga ma bzhin du sbyin sreg gi yo byad thams cad bsangs te /
T02TD1447E:297b-12: de nas dgang gzar blangs la ji tsam nus pa'i dgang blugs me lha'i zhal du dbul lo //
T02TD1447E:297b-13: de bzhin du blugs gzar gyis stong ngam /
T02TD1447E:297b-16: bzhi cha yang rung bsreg go //
T02TD1447E:297b-17: de nas yang dgang blugs gsum dbul te /
T02TD1447E:297b-18: 'di ltar dkyil 'khor ma lus pa kun la bcu cha'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD1447E:297b-19: thams cad la dgang blugs dang spos dang /
T02TD1447E:297b-20: dril bu'i sgra dang yi ge brgya pa gsum mam gcig bzlas te /
T02TD1447E:297b-21: me tog la sogs pa dag pa dbul lo //
T02TD1447E:297b-22: sbyin sreg gi yo byad thams cad kyis snga ma bzhin du sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD1447E:297b-23: dbyangs skyong gi gsang sngags sam yi ge bdun pa'am /
T02TD1447E:297b-24: rdo rje phag mo'i nye ba'i snying po'i gsang sngags gang yang rung ba las 'di zhes bya ba sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1447E:297b-25: zhes bya ba mthar gdags so //
T02TD1447E:297b-26: rgyas pa'i mthar ni pushti bku ru /
T02TD1447E:297b-27: boo sha ta dbang gi mthar ro //
T02TD1447E:297b-29: yang dri zhim po las byung ba ci yang rung ste /
T02TD1447E:297b-30: thams cad bdag gis kha zas la sogs pa 'byor pa'i don du sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD1447E:297b-31: de ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i sbyin sreg byas la dngos grub kyi phyir /
T02TD1447E:297b-32: rgyud las bshad pa'i rdzas rnams kyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD1447E:297b-33: ba lang sha dang rta sha dang /
T02TD1447E:297b-34: shva na'i sha dang khyim bya dag / dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas nas ni //
T02TD1447E:297b-35: sangs rgyas nyid kyang nges par 'jig / phyir bzlog phreng ba'i gsang sngags kyis //
T02TD1447E:297b-36: zhi ba la sogs las rnams bya //
T02TD1447E:298a-0: rdo rje phag mo'i sngags gnyis @298a * //
T02TD1447E:298a-2: dgug pa la sogs bya ba yin //
T02TD1447E:298a-3: de nas ji ltar 'dod pa'i sbyin sreg byas pa'i mthar aom hr'i: ha ha h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1447E:298a-4: nye ba'i snying po 'di gsum mam /
T02TD1447E:298a-5: bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig mar gyi sreg blugs kyis sbar la /
T02TD1447E:298a-6: mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dang /
T02TD1447E:298a-8: dril bu'i rol mo snga ma bzhin du dbul lo //
T02TD1447E:298a-9: dgang blugs kyi mthar bde legs dang rol mo dang /
T02TD1447E:298a-10: bkra shis pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dbul lo //
T02TD1447E:298a-11: de nas bstod pa bya ste /
T02TD1447E:298a-12: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub gsol la /
T02TD1447E:298a-14: rdo rje bcing ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD1447E:298a-15: aom he ru ka mu: 'dis steng du dgrol te /
T02TD1447E:298a-16: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02TD1447E:298a-17: ces pa la sogs pa brjod do //
T02TD1447E:298a-18: de nas aom kha kha kh'a hi zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis nya dang sha dang /
T02TD1447E:298a-20: zan dron la sogs pas yongs su gang ba'i gtor ma byin no //
T02TD1447E:298a-21: me'i dbus nas ye shes sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su gyur te gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD1447E:298a-22: de nas me la mchod yon la sogs pa phul te /
T02TD1447E:298a-23: sbyin sreg gi yo byad lhag ma rnams kyang sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD1447E:298a-24: sreg blugs kyi mthar bsgrub bya bzung la dgang blugs dbul lo //
T02TD1447E:298a-25: mchod yon zhabs bsil dang bsang gtor yang bya /
T02TD1447E:298a-26: sgrub pa po mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyang gsol te /
T02TD1447E:298a-27: aom aagna ye ya hi ya hi /
T02TD1447E:298a-28: sarbbam rtse khe pa ra aa tham tsas ti dha ma ga tsa ha phyag byug ces bya'o //
T02TD1447E:298a-29: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong phyir bskyed pa'i tshul gyis sprul pa'i me 'bar ba'i gzugs can du blta ba de gshegs su gsol te /
T02TD1447E:298a-30: rang gi lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma sbyin no //
T02TD1447E:298a-31: rje btsun gyi yi ge brgya ba yang lan bdun gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD1447E:298a-32: aom badzra k'i li k'i l'a ya /
T02TD1447E:298a-33: zhes bya bas phyogs kyi phur bu dang /
T02TD1447E:298a-35: las thams cad pa'i chu 'o ma dang bcas pa khanda ro ha'i rigs sngags kyis btab ste /
T02TD1447E:298a-37: de nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te /
T02TD1447E:298a-38: glu dang gar la sogs pa mdun du bya zhing ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o /
T02TD1447E:298a-40: // / dpal sdom rnal 'byor ma rgyud las //
T02TD1447E:298b-0: @298b sbyin sreg rim pa phyung ba 'dis //
T02TD1447E:298b-1: rnal 'byor ba ni rtag dga' ba'i //
T02TD1447E:298b-2: dngos grub myur du grub par shog / dpal he ru ka'i ming gi rgyud las /
T02TD1447E:298b-3: dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga grub pa'i slob dpon chen po nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1447E:298b-5: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dharmma bha dra dang /
T02TD1447E:298b-6: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rig pa gzhon nus bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab ba'o //
